general_advisory: As there is a chance of occurrence of light to moderate rainfall along with heavy rainfall in one or two places in the upcoming days, farmers are advised to avoid irrigation and spraying operations during that period. They should wait a few days for transplanting of rice and planting of fruit and vegetable crops. Due to high wind speed conditions, make provisions to support the crops.

advisory: Nursery sowing should be completed by end of 2nd fortnight of July.
Main field land preparation should include puddling the field twice at intervals and land leveling for uniform crop stand.
Ideal sowing time for kharif maize is June 20 to end of July, dependent on the monsoon onset.
Treat seeds with fungicides and insecticides before sowing to protect from diseases.
Start raised bed nursery preparation for kharif vegetable crops with proper drainage system to avoid waterlogging.
Ensure deworming and vaccination of animals against infectious diseases.
